alert.note: Alert for York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL MECKLENBURG... SOUTHWESTERN UNION AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles south of Indian Land, or near Van Wyck, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Indian Land, South Charlotte, Weddington, Fort Mill, Wesley Chapel, Waxhaw, Mineral Springs, Lesslie, and Marvin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
